• Read the books you buy on Amazon in the Kindle app. Choose from over six million Kindle books (including those with Audible narration), magazines, and comics and start reading in seconds. Explore Amazon Charts best sellers and titles across genres like romance, science fiction, children’s books, self-help, religion, nonfiction, and more—and try any book with a free sample straight from the Kindle app.

• Kindle Unlimited members can enjoy unlimited reading and listening, with the freedom to explore over 1 million titles, thousands of audiobooks, and current magazines. 

• Over 1,000 books, magazines, comics, and more included with Amazon Prime.

• Kindle Vella brings you stories released one short episode at a time. The first three episodes of every story are always free--after that, purchase Tokens and redeem them to unlock episodes. Tokens may only be used to unlock Kindle Vella story episodes and are available for In-App purchase. Kindle Vella and In-App purchase of Tokens are currently only available in the US. 

GO BEYOND PAPER
Turn your iPhone or iPad into a book with the free Kindle app—so you can read anytime, anywhere. Explore these reading features in the Kindle app:

• Read your way. Customize your text size, font type, margins, text alignment, and orientation (portrait or landscape)—and choose whether to turn pages from left to right or continuously scroll. Read comfortably day and night with adjustable brightness and background colors. Go to the Aa menu in your book to get started.

• Look up words, people, and places while you read. Breeze through words you don’t know and characters you can’t remember with the built-in dictionary, X-Ray, Wikipedia lookup, instant translations, and search within your book. Simply tap and hold a word to view its definition, or use the Google and Wikipedia links to get more information.

• Track your reading progress. See what percent of the book you’ve read, real page numbers (for most top titles), and how much time you have left in the chapter or book based on your actual reading speed. 

• Bookmark places you want to revisit, and make highlights and take notes throughout your book. Open My Notebook to see all your notes in the same place.

• Hop, skim, and jump with Page Flip. Flip between pages or get a bird’s-eye view of your book with Page Flip—don’t worry, we’ll save your place.

• Zoom in on high-definition color images in Kindle books, magazines, comics, and manga.

• Sync your books across devices. When you’re reading a book, the Kindle app will automatically sync where you left off—along with any bookmarks, highlights, or notes—so you can start reading on one device and pick up where you left off on another.

• When you can’t read, listen. Switch seamlessly from reading your Kindle book to listening to the Audible book, all within the Kindle app.

• Get notified when authors you love have new releases.

Select Jurassic World: Where Dinosaurs Come to Life in the app to discover 5 incredible Jurassic World dinosaurs in Augmented Reality through Single User, Dual User and Life Size mode experiences. Choose  Jurassic World: Special Edition - From DNA to Indominus rex™! for the latest dino enhancements plus five completely new AR dinosaurs and an amazing Gyrosphere experience.

With Jurassic World: Where Dinosaurs Come to Life
Five Jurassic World Dinosaurs
- Bring Jurassic World’s Tyrannosaurus Rex to life and hear its terrifying roar.
- Explore with a Triceratops… but watch out for those horns.
- Select any of the 4 Jurassic World Raptors and let them roam around your home.
- See the wonderful Stegosaurus swing its spiked tail.
- Get up close to the ultimate Jurassic World dinosaur, the genetically modified Indominus Rex.

With Jurassic World: Special Edition - From DNA to Indominus rex™!
- Come face-to-face with 10 lifesize dinosaurs
- Take control of the incredible Gyrosphere
- Fly a pteranodon around your home
- Get seriously close to scary Spinosaurus
- Enter the underwater world of the mighty Mosasaurus!

- SINGLE USER MODE – allows you to interact with each Jurassic World dinosaur making them walk and roar.
- DUAL USER MODE – allows a friend to join in the fun: with two devices, watch TWO Jurassic World dinosaurs roam together. 

Both User Modes allow you to take incredible photos of Jurassic World dinosaurs with your family and friends. These can be saved to your photo album, ready to print or share.

HOW IT WORKS
For Jurassic World: Where Dinosaurs Come to Life, trigger the Augmented Reality with your book or see the dinosaurs in action even without owning the book by printing out the special page supplied with the app. Using either the printed page or the ACTIVATION PAGES in the book, launch the app, point your device’s camera at the book while it is open flat on the floor or a table and watch your dinosaurs spring to life! 

For Jurassic World: Special Edition - From DNA to Indominus rex™!, owners of the book can access all of the Augmented Reality experiences immediately. If you don't own a copy of the book, you can download a free sample trigger and, if you like what you see, buy the book or purchase the full set of Augmented Reality triggers directly from the app.

The HELP pages in the app explain how to get the best experience, but have fun exploring different viewpoints and different locations.

summary.label:
澳門基金會一直致力推動學術研究和出版工作，迄今已出版近千種書籍和期刊，為了與市民共享學術文化資源、傳播澳門學術成果，本會於1999年創立“澳門虛擬圖書館”，成為本澳首個網上閱讀平台，一直為各地讀者提供免費、便捷的澳門圖書網上閱覽服務。

“澳門虛擬圖書館”創立以來，見證着澳門研究遍地開花、資訊科技飛速發展；進入2022年，為配合網絡時代的閱讀習慣，並響應澳門特區政府智慧城市的發展路向，“澳門虛擬圖書館”於2022年3月正式改版，並使用www.macaudata.mo作為永久網址，與本會的澳門記憶文史網 (www.macaumemory.mo) 分別在學術研究與人文普及兩方面，共同助力“澳門學”發展。

改版後的“澳門虛擬圖書館”以嶄新面貌登場，功能全面提升，並使用大數據整合出版成果、學者機構與學術動態，構建澳門學的信息、學術交流研究中心。重點內容包括：

▧ 典藏資源
“澳門虛擬圖書館”作為“澳門學”的雲端平台，典藏大量的澳門出版品，以及與澳門研究相關的圖書/期刊/論文，更整合了各學科的經典文獻與最新成果。本網站提供全文閱讀及深度檢索，將澳門研究資源向全球讀者開放，促進“澳門學”各範疇發展。

▧ 知識網絡
本網站以學術成果串連研究澳門的專家學者和機構團體，構築“澳門學”的知識網絡。特設學者專版提供個人簡介及出版成果，並可相互連結至相關學科或議題，縱覽澳門的學人群像。此外，亦串連了本地及外地的出版單位、學術機構、社文團體的出版成果，以及有關的學術動態。

▧ 多元展示
為配合網絡時代的閱讀習慣，將按不同主題組織多元化的網上書展，推廣澳門出版物，整合澳門研究成果。此外，特設專題文章及書刊評論，並公開徵稿，以期進一步深化討論，構築“澳門學”的交流平台。

▧ 社會協作
為了整合澳門出版成果，豐富“澳門虛擬圖書館”的館藏，澳門基金會致力與各政府部門、院校、出版機構分工協作；另一方面，通過開展澳門出版物徵集活動，鼓勵團體及個人提供資料，共建共享資源，與各界攜手推動澳門學術研究的發展。
